## SchemaResource.loadSchema() method

Load the content of a schema object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadSchema(schema: Maybe<T>, quiet?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  schema | [Maybe](./workflow.maybe.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | the schema object to load |
|  quiet | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> prevent change events from bubbling. Default=false |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
